instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2141: What is A2141? A2141 is a model number for a 16 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3347, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01700..
definitions.820-01700: What is 820-01700? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> wont boot, stay on lock after DFU
threads.message:
Hello,

I have a MacBook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01700</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a that doesn't boot, it goes to 20v, and charges. I tried to put it in DFU, it accepts. When I try to restore or revive it, it passes on this lock. Not being acclimatized to the t2 yet, I have a hard time figuring out what this means :/

thanks in advance for any information !

threads.title: Macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> wont boot, stay on lock after DFU
Macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> wont boot, stay on lock after DFU
threads.message: same problem with restore :( it start,on host mac, but nothing on target mac, black screen

threads.title: Macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> wont boot, stay on lock after DFU
threads.message:
That is normal on the beginning.
After restore is done, T2 machine should continue with fresh installation.

threads.title: Macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> wont boot, stay on lock after DFU
threads.message: So, i have to let it work alone ? Do you have an idea of time to wait ? Thanks

threads.title: Macbook pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> wont boot, stay on lock after DFU
threads.message: Once DFU restore is finished, you should get image on T2 machine; whit install menu.
